philoin Items
The URL of the philoin dashboard (based on hostname or IP). If configured, autodiscovery is disabled. Current setting: %s
The URL of the philoin dashboard used when the local address is unavailable. Current setting: %s

Unlock to access philoin
philoin, at your command!

Connection unsuccessful. An unexpected response was received while trying to connect to the configured philoin server (HTTP code %d).
Your reverse proxy got an invalid answer from the philoin server (HTTP code %d)
The philoin server is temporarily unavailable (HTTP code %d)
Gateway time-out. Seems that your reverse proxy is running, but couldn\'t get an answer from the philoin server (HTTP code %d).
The philoin server hasn\'t enough free space (HTTP code %d)
philoin is offline
Reverse proxy got invalid answer from philoin (HTTP code %d)
philoin temporarily unavailable (HTTP code %d)

Your philoin server is offline while the cloud instance is running
philoin Rest API version
Sends Wi-Fi name (SSID) to Item \'%1$s\'. \"Location\" must be turned on, otherwise philoin isn\'t allowed to get the Wi-Fi name.
Unavailable, remote server isn\'t an philoin cloud instance

This device identifier can be any string and should be unique for all devices accessing your philoin server. Besides the two use cases above, you can also use it as state on NFC tags, so you know which device read the tag.
